_comments: add a new card = add:true, newValues {}

exceptions._comment: Delete those promos included in mtgsalvation's data
Tag the taplands because in m19 they randomly replace the basic land slot
exceptions.where: title=(Cinder Barrens|Forsaken Sanctuary|Foul Orchard|Highland Lake|Meandering River|Stone Quarry|Submerged Boneyard|Timber Gorge|Tranquil Expanse|Woodland Stream)
